name: Cathy
dialogue: Did you guys hear about the new comedy club opening up downtown? It's going to be huge!

name: Ben
dialogue: (squinting) Really? I hadn't heard. What makes you say that?

name: Cathy
dialogue: Well, I overheard the owner talking to some investors and they said it's going to be a huge hit. Plus, they've already booked some big names for opening night. (giggles) Can you imagine?

name: Ben
dialogue: (smiling) That does sound interesting. I'll have to check it out.

name: Cathy
dialogue: Oh, totally! You should come with me and we can laugh our heads off together! (winks)
